jobInfo.postDescription:
Job description:
The test engineer performs appropriate testing and/or quality assurance of software components and adheres to the testing processes including the bug process. Responsible for keeping the defined testing productivity.
职位描述:
软件测试工程师根据测试用例进行测试, 在测试过程中严格保证测试质量, 撰写Bug Report并跟踪BUG.
 
Responsibilities:
*     implement and apply the project testkit and plan
*     execute pre-defined test cases and report software errors
*     monitor assigned bugs and supply relevant information required by software engineers
*     keep bug standards and adequacy in the bug database as per project criteria
*     keep the estimated times, flag productivity issues in timely manner
*     communicate closely and pro-actively with the Test Lead 
*     report relevant issues to the project Test Lead or PM
岗位职责:
*     根据测试计划, 在测试组长的组织安排下执行测试工作
*     根据测试用例对客户提供的本地化软件产品进行测试, 并且汇报BUG到指定数据库
*     跟踪所提交的BUG, 并且提供软件工程师所需要的相关资料信息
*     严格按照客户的标准和要求进行BUG报告
*     根据客户预计的时间, 保证测试进度，按时完成测试任务
*     测试过程中及时向Test Leader或PM报告相关的产品问题, 汇报工作进度
*     对客户尚未发售的产品严格保密 
Knowledge and skills:
*     junior college degree or above; Above CET-4.
*     good knowledge of Windows operating systems, advanced user knowledge of typical PC applications (like MS Excel) or equivalents; (Mac or Linux knowledge is plus).
*     good English spoken and written
*     initiative approach aimed at achieving the highest quality of the tested product.
*     be a team player
技术要求:
*     大专以上学历
*     掌握Windows 操作系统多个版本的操作和基本知识, 熟练使用办公软件 (尤其Excel，Outlook)，同时掌握Mac或Linux使用者优先
*     良好的英文阅读理解和写作能力 
*     良好的分析问题的能力，能在产品测试过程中能主动发现并善于处理问题
*     工作认真细致，有上进心和良好的团队合作意识，热爱软件测试工作
jobInfo.address: 南京秦淮区南京摩睿信息技术有限公司秦淮区建邺路98号鸿信大厦3楼

brandComInfo.introduce:
About RWS

RWS Holdings plc is the world’s leading provider of technology-enabled language, content management and intellectual property services. We help our customers to connect with and bring new ideas to people globally by communicating business critical content at scale and enabling the protection and realization of their innovations.

Our vision is to help organizations interact effectively with people anywhere in the world by solving their language, content and market access challenges through our collective global intelligence, deep expertise and smart technology.

Customers include 90 of the globe’s top 100 brands, the top 10 pharmaceutical companies and 18 of the top 20 patent filers worldwide. Our client base spans Europe, Asia Pacific, and North and South America across the technology, pharmaceutical, medical, legal, chemical, automotive, government and telecommunications sectors, which we serve from offices across five continents.

Founded in 1958, RWS is headquartered in the UK and publicly listed on AIM, the London Stock Exchange regulated market (RWS.L).
For further information, please visit: www.rws.com.
